file.title: Message valid

p.text: When the user successfully activates the program it displays a message. Text this message keeps this property.

remarks.text: If the message you want to add quotes, it becomes a double repetition of the quotes within the text that you want to assign:
remarks.codesnip: "This is the text without quotation marks, and" here in quotation marks "". "

p.text: To insert newline (analog pressing Enter), use Auxiliary words -!> ;! Other , or insert a symbol "¶"
p.codesnip: Window1.Knopka1.Tekst = "text ¶ The text on a new line"

file.seealso:
Message unsuccessful activation
Activation Key check
Other object
